title: Alejandro Giammattei
summary:
Alejandro Eduardo Giammattei Falla (Spanish pronunciation: [aleˈxãndɾo ʝamaˈtei]; born 9 March 1956) is a Guatemalan politician who has been serving as the president of Guatemala since 2020.
He is a former director of the Guatemalan penitentiary system and participated in Guatemala's presidential elections in 2007, 2011, and 2015.
He won in the 2019 election, and assumed office on 14 January 2020.
